oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 19; East; 7; 18.0x35.0; *Can't find the deed, but according to the Plat book this lot is owned by Dr. William Harris.; Harris, Adam G. 1775-1840; Harris, Elizabeth S. 1834 (born); Harris, Emma 1841-1843; Harris, Medora F. 1837-1847; Harris, William 1808-1846; Harris, William Hume 1834-1894; McKay, Ella M.
